verses.verse: Now these <WH428> are they that came <WH935> to <WH413> David <WH1732> to Ziklag, <WH6860> while he yet <WH5750> kept himself close <WH6113> because <WH4480> <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586> the son <WH1121> of Kish: <WH7027> and they <WH1992> were among the mighty men, <WH1368> helpers <WH5826> of the war. <WH4421>

They were armed <WH5401> with bows, <WH7198> and could use both the right hand <WH3231> and the left <WH8041> in hurling stones <WH68> and shooting arrows <WH2671> out of a bow, <WH7198> even of Saul's brethren <WH4480> <WH251> <WH7586> of Benjamin. <WH4480> <WH1144>

The chief <WH7218> was Ahiezer, <WH295> then Joash, <WH3101> the sons <WH1121> of Shemaah <WH8094> the Gibeathite; <WH1395> and Jeziel, <WH3149> and Pelet, <WH6404> the sons <WH1121> of Azmaveth; <WH5820> and Berachah, <WH1294> and Jehu <WH3058> the Antothite, <WH6069>

And Ismaiah <WH3460> the Gibeonite, <WH1393> a mighty man <WH1368> among the thirty, <WH7970> and over <WH5921> the thirty; <WH7970> and Jeremiah, <WH3414> and Jahaziel, <WH3166> and Johanan, <WH3110> and Josabad <WH3107> the Gederathite, <WH1452>
Eluzai, <WH498> and Jerimoth, <WH3406> and Bealiah, <WH1183> and Shemariah, <WH8114> and Shephatiah <WH8203> the Haruphite, <WH2741>
Elkanah, <WH511> and Jesiah, <WH3449> and Azareel, <WH5832> and Joezer, <WH3134> and Jashobeam, <WH3434> the Korhites, <WH7145>
And Joelah, <WH3132> and Zebadiah, <WH2069> the sons <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395> of <WH4480> Gedor. <WH1446>

And of <WH4480> the Gadites <WH1425> there separated themselves <WH914> unto <WH413> David <WH1732> into the hold <WH4679> to the wilderness <WH4057> men <WH1368> of might, <WH2428> and men <WH376> of war <WH6635> fit for the battle, <WH4421> that could handle <WH6186> shield <WH6793> and buckler, <WH7420> whose faces <WH6440> were like the faces <WH6440> of lions, <WH738> and were as swift <WH4116> as the roes <WH6643> upon <WH5921> the mountains; <WH2022>
Ezer <WH5829> the first, <WH7218> Obadiah <WH5662> the second, <WH8145> Eliab <WH446> the third, <WH7992>
Mishmannah <WH4925> the fourth, <WH7243> Jeremiah <WH3414> the fifth, <WH2549>
Attai <WH6262> the sixth, <WH8345> Eliel <WH447> the seventh, <WH7637>
Johanan <WH3110> the eighth, <WH8066> Elzabad <WH443> the ninth, <WH8671>
Jeremiah <WH3414> the tenth, <WH6224> Machbanai <WH4344> the eleventh. <WH6249> <WH6240>

These <WH428> were of the sons <WH4480> <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> captains <WH7218> of the host: <WH6635> one <WH259> of the least <WH6996> was over a hundred, <WH3967> and the greatest <WH1419> over a thousand. <WH505>

These <WH428> are they <WH1992> that <WH834> went over <WH5674> <WH853> Jordan <WH3383> in the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> when it <WH1931> had overflown <WH4390> <WH5921> all <WH3605> his banks; <WH1428> and they put to flight <WH1272> <WH853> all <WH3605> them of the valleys, <WH6010> both toward the east, <WH4217> and toward the west. <WH4628>
And there came <WH935> of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> and Judah <WH3063> to <WH5704> the hold <WH4679> unto David. <WH1732>

And David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> to meet <WH6440> them, and answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto them, If <WH518> ye be come <WH935> peaceably <WH7965> unto <WH413> me to help <WH5826> me, mine heart <WH3824> shall be <WH1961> knit <WH3162> unto <WH5921> you: but if <WH518> ye be come to betray <WH7411> me to mine enemies, <WH6862> seeing there is no <WH3808> wrong <WH2555> in mine hands, <WH3709> the God <WH430> of our fathers <WH1> look <WH7200> thereon, and rebuke <WH3198> it.

Then the spirit <WH7307> came upon <WH3847> <WH853> Amasai, <WH6022> who was chief <WH7218> of the captains, <WH7991> and he said, Thine are we, David, <WH1732> and on thy side, <WH5973> thou son <WH1121> of Jesse: <WH3448> peace, <WH7965> peace <WH7965> be unto thee, and peace <WH7965> be to thine helpers; <WH5826> for <WH3588> thy God <WH430> helpeth <WH5826> thee. Then David <WH1732> received <WH6901> them, and made <WH5414> them captains <WH7218> of the band. <WH1416>

And there fell <WH5307> some of <WH4480> Manasseh <WH4519> to <WH5921> David, <WH1732> when he came <WH935> with <WH5973> the Philistines <WH6430> against <WH5921> Saul <WH7586> to battle: <WH4421> but they helped <WH5826> them not: <WH3808> for <WH3588> the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> upon advisement <WH6098> sent him away, <WH7971> saying, <WH559> He will fall <WH5307> to <WH413> his master <WH113> Saul <WH7586> to the jeopardy of our heads. <WH7218>

As he went <WH1980> to <WH413> Ziklag, <WH6860> there fell <WH5307> to <WH5921> him of Manasseh, <WH4480> <WH4519> Adnah, <WH5734> and Jozabad, <WH3107> and Jediael, <WH3043> and Michael, <WH4317> and Jozabad, <WH3107> and Elihu, <WH453> and Zilthai, <WH6769> captains <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> that <WH834> were of Manasseh. <WH4519>

And they <WH1992> helped <WH5826> <WH5973> David <WH1732> against <WH5921> the band <WH1416> of the rovers: for <WH3588> they were all <WH3605> mighty men <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and were <WH1961> captains <WH8269> in the host. <WH6635>

For <WH3588> at that time <WH6256> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117> there came <WH935> to <WH5921> David <WH1732> to help <WH5826> him, until <WH5704> it was a great <WH1419> host, <WH4264> like the host <WH4264> of God. <WH430>

And these <WH428> are the numbers <WH4557> of the bands <WH7218> that were ready armed <WH2502> to the war, <WH6635> and came <WH935> to <WH5921> David <WH1732> to Hebron, <WH2275> to turn <WH5437> the kingdom <WH4438> of Saul <WH7586> to <WH413> him, according to the word <WH6310> of the LORD. <WH3068>

The children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> that bore <WH5375> shield <WH6793> and spear <WH7420> were six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred, <WH3967> ready armed <WH2502> to the war. <WH6635>
Of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> mighty men <WH1368> of valor <WH2428> for the war, <WH6635> seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> and one hundred. <WH3967>
Of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>
And Jehoiada <WH3111> was the leader <WH5057> of the Aaronites, <WH175> and with <WH5973> him were three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred; <WH3967>
And Zadok, <WH6659> a young man <WH5288> mighty <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> and of his father's <WH1> house <WH1004> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> captains. <WH8269>

And of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> the kindred <WH251> of Saul, <WH7586> three <WH7969> thousand: <WH505> for hitherto <WH5704> <WH2008> the greatest part <WH4768> of them had kept <WH8104> the ward <WH4931> of the house <WH1004> of Saul. <WH7586>

And of <WH4480> the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> and eight <WH8083> hundred, <WH3967> mighty men <WH1368> of valor, <WH2428> famous <WH376> <WH8034> throughout the house <WH1004> of their fathers. <WH1>

And of the half <WH4480> <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> eighteen <WH8083> <WH6240> thousand, <WH505> which <WH834> were expressed <WH5344> by name, <WH8034> to come <WH935> and make David king. <WH4427> <WH853> <WH1732>

And of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Issachar, <WH3485> which were men that had <WH3045> understanding <WH998> of the times, <WH6256> to know <WH3045> what <WH4100> Israel <WH3478> ought to do; <WH6213> the heads <WH7218> of them were two hundred; <WH3967> and all <WH3605> their brethren <WH251> were at <WH5921> their commandment. <WH6310>

Of Zebulun, <WH4480> <WH2074> such as went forth <WH3318> to battle, <WH6635> expert <WH6186> in war, <WH4421> with all <WH3605> instruments <WH3627> of war, <WH4421> fifty <WH2572> thousand, <WH505> which could keep rank: <WH5737> they were not <WH3808> of double heart. <WH3820> <WH3820>
And of Naphtali <WH4480> <WH5321> a thousand <WH505> captains, <WH8269> and with <WH5973> them with shield <WH6793> and spear <WH2595> thirty <WH7970> and seven <WH7651> thousand. <WH505>
And of <WH4480> the Danites <WH1839> expert <WH6186> in war <WH4421> twenty <WH6242> and eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>
And of Asher, <WH4480> <WH836> such as went forth <WH3318> to battle, <WH6635> expert <WH6186> in war, <WH4421> forty <WH705> thousand. <WH505>

And on the other side <WH4480> <WH5676> of Jordan, <WH3383> of <WH4480> the Reubenites, <WH7206> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> with all manner <WH3605> of instruments <WH3627> of war <WH6635> for the battle, <WH4421> a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> thousand. <WH505>

All <WH3605> these <WH428> men <WH376> of war, <WH4421> that could keep <WH5737> rank, <WH4634> came <WH935> with a perfect <WH8003> heart <WH3824> to Hebron, <WH2275> to make David king <WH4427> <WH853> <WH1732> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> Israel: <WH3478> and all <WH3605> the rest <WH7611> also <WH1571> of Israel <WH3478> were of one <WH259> heart <WH3820> to make David king. <WH4427> <WH853> <WH1732>

And there <WH8033> they were <WH1961> with <WH5973> David <WH1732> three <WH7969> days, <WH3117> eating <WH398> and drinking: <WH8354> for <WH3588> their brethren <WH251> had prepared <WH3559> for them.

Moreover <WH1571> they that were nigh <WH7138> <WH413> them, even unto <WH5704> Issachar <WH3485> and Zebulun <WH2074> and Naphtali, <WH5321> brought <WH935> bread <WH3899> on asses, <WH2543> and on camels, <WH1581> and on mules, <WH6505> and on oxen, <WH1241> and meat, <WH3978> meal, <WH7058> cakes of figs, <WH1690> and bunches of raisins, <WH6778> and wine, <WH3196> and oil, <WH8081> and oxen, <WH1241> and sheep <WH6629> abundantly: <WH7230> for <WH3588> there was joy <WH8057> in Israel. <WH3478>
